definition[0]: used by the person who is speaking to show that something belongs to or is connected with himself or herself
example[0]: Have you seen my car keys?
example[2]: I’m sure you don’t want to listen to all my problems.
example[3]: Even my own family wouldn’t believe me.
definition[1]: used when you are surprised, impressed, or upset
example[5]: My! Look at the size of that tree!
example[6]: ‘It’s 3.30.’ ‘Oh my, I’m going to be late!’
